entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating near noon. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Periods of rain mixed with snow beginning this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
